column4: what can i use to play qualcomm purevoice (qcp) format audio?
is there something i need to do to be able to mount an iso thats on a samba share? i tried smb://
: mount //ip/share_name /mnt/mount_point
: if on netowrk dont use loop
: if the file is on your own disk use loop
i get special device smb://blah does not exist., but i can get to it through naut
: run df and see where its mounted..
: but i think you didnt use //ip/share_name /mnt/existing_mount_point
: smbclient -L ip
how do i set the username with a space in it? i tried %20 and it got angry
just quoted it
: put "name name"
: ie, in quotes..
: but its just easier all around to not use spaces @ all
kind of peeved i didn't think to do that...
: try \ before the space also name\ name
i meant to say, i tried quotes and it worked
: am used to using the commandline.. ubuntu users aint
that took way too much finagling to get mounted. most likely cuz of the spaces (my documents, user name)
got it working, thanks
: try not to name anything with spaces in it
